org.restlet.data
Interface CookiesReader

All Known Implementing Classes:
CookiesReaderImpl
public interface CookiesReader

Cookies reader.

Method Summary
 void close()
          Closes the reader.
 Cookie readCookie()
          Reads the next cookie available or null.
 void readCookies(Map<String,Cookie> cookies)
          Reads the cookies whose name is a key in the given map.
 

Method Detail

readCookies

void readCookies(Map<String,Cookie> cookies)
                 throws IOException
Reads the cookies whose name is a key in the given map. If a matching cookie is found, its value is put in the map.

Parameters:
cookies - The cookies map controlling the reading.
Throws:
IOException

readCookie

Cookie readCookie()
                  throws IOException
Reads the next cookie available or null.

Returns:
The next cookie available or null.
Throws:
IOException

close

void close()
           throws IOException
Closes the reader.

Throws:
IOException
